column4: hey guys.. having a video problem here... I installed the nVidia drivers for my nVidia card, and it recognized my card and everything, but I can't use OpenGL at all... I already have a bunch of Mesa stuff installed by default, but I can't get OpenGL to work at all... not even the screen savers
anyone have any ideas on getting OpenGL to work?
did you modify xorg.cong and change nv to nvidia?
